summary: Provides implementations of the GraySynth algorithm for constructing CNOT‑Phase circuits with low CNOT count and the Patel‑Hayes‑Markov method for optimal synthesis of linear (CNOT‑only) reversible circuits, exposing functions that translate binary matrices or phase specifications into Qiskit QuantumCircuit objects.
business_intent: Facilitate efficient quantum circuit compilation by generating compact CNOT‑Phase and linear reversible circuits, thereby reducing gate overhead and improving performance of quantum algorithms on hardware.
